message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Daily schedule name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: A daily schedule with the name "%1s" already exists at this location. Please use a different name.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_FV_EFFECTIVEDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Daily Schedule start date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_FV_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Daily schedule start date cannot be earlier than today's date.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_EXIST
message.locale: A daily schedule of the same type already exists for the same start date that you have entered within the same location.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this daily schedule as it has been canceled.
You cannot modify this daily schedule as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_TIME_SLOT_AFTER_EFFECTIVEDATE
message.locale: A work unit has already been allocated to a slot on this date for an existing daily schedule of the same type.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_TIME_PSA_AFTER_EFFECTIVEDATE
message.locale: A position has been assigned to a slot within this schedule before the new start date entered.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_SCHEDULE_INACTIVE
message.locale: The Slot cannot be processed as its associated schedule is inactive.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_SCHEDULE_DATE_INVALID
message.locale: The Slot cannot be processed as the date is earlier than schedule's effective date.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_XRV_SCHEDULE_DATE_AFTER_EFFECTIVEDATE
message.locale: The Slot cannot be processed as the date is greater than or equal to start date of next schedule.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_FV_SCHEDULE_EMPTY
message.locale: Daily schedule does not exist for the Slot.
